name: Break A Leg (itch) (DanSTrim)
description:
In this short game your goal is simple: Break a leg!

Break A Leg is a light puzzle platformer. You can break your leg by falling hard enough on the ground. How? That's for you to figure out. Do you simply find a high place to jump from? Do you use your momentum from trampolines to position yourself for a harder fall? Solve a puzzle reveal the path?

Challenges you will face vary from platforming challenges, to platform puzzles, to a mix of both!

Break a leg!
